column1: Married women currently using any method of contraception
column2: Percentage of currently married or in union women currently using any method of contraception

column1: Married women currently using any modern method of contraception
column2: Percentage of currently married or in union women currently using any modern method of contraception

column1: Unmet need for family planning
column2: Percentage of currently married or in union women with an unmet need for family planning

column1: Demand for family planning satisfied by modern methods
column2: Percentage of demand for family planning satisfied by modern methods is calculated as the number of currently married women using modern methods of family planning divided by the number of currently married women with demand for family planning (either with unmet need or currently using any family planning)

column1: Pregnancy-related mortality ratio
column2: Pregnancy-related mortality ratio for the seven years preceding the survey expressed per 1,000 women-years of exposure. Pregnancy-related deaths are deaths during pregnancy, delivery and in the two months following delivery, including deaths due to accidents or violence

column1: Maternal mortality ratio
column2: Maternal mortality ratio for the seven years preceding the survey expressed per 100,000 live births, calculated as the age-adjusted maternal mortality rate times 100 divided by the age-adjusted general fertility rate. Maternal deaths are deaths to adult females during pregnancy, delivery or in the 42 days following delivery, excluding those due to accidents or violence.

column1: Women circumcised (FGC)
column2: Percentage of women circumcised (women who experienced female genital cutting (FGM))

column1: Physical or sexual violence committed by husband/partner
column2: Percentage of ever married women who have ever experienced physical or sexual violence committed by their husband or partner

column1: Women who are literate
column2: Percentage of women who are literate

column1: Women with secondary or higher education
column2: Percentage of women with secondary or higher education

column1: Women first married by exact age 15
column2: Percentage of women who were first married by exact age 15

column1: Women first married by exact age 18
column2: Percentage of women who were first married by exact age 18

column1: Married women participating in all three decisions
column2: Percentage of currently married or in union women participating in decision making for their own health care, for major household pruchases, and for visits to her family or relatives

column1: Married women who disagree with all the reasons justifying wife beating
column2: Percentage of currently married or in union women who disagree with all the reasons justifying wife beating

column1: Sexual violence before exact age 18
column2: Percentage of women who experienced sexual violence before exact age 18

column1: Median years of education completed [Women]
column2: Median number of years of education completed by women

column1: Women who worked in the last 12 months and are currently
column2: Percentage of women who worked in the 12 months preceding the survey and are working currently

column1: Net primary school attendance rate: Female
column2: Percentage of primary school age girls attending primary school

column1: Wife beating justified for at least one specific reason [Women]
column2: Percentage of women who agree that a husband is justified in hitting or beating his wife for at least one specific reason

column1: No antenatal care
column2: Percentage of live births in the five (or three) years preceding the survey who received no antenatal care

column1: General fertility rate
column2: General fertility rate for the three years preceding the survey expressed per 1,000 women age 15-44

column1: Women giving birth by age 15
column2: Percentage of women who gave birth by age 15

column1: Women giving birth by age 18
column2: Percentage of women who gave birth by age 18

column1: Women who decide themselves how their earnings are used
column2: Percentage of currently married or in union women employed in the 12 months preceding the survey receiving cash earnings who decides herself how the earnings are used

column1: Women who decide jointly with partner how their earnings are used
column2: Percentage of currently married or in union women employed in the 12 months preceding the survey receiving cash earnings who decides jointly with partner how the earnings are used

column1: Wife earns more than husband
column2: Percentage of currently married or in union women employed in the 12 months preceding the survey whose cash earnings are more than her husband s
